Extracted Variables:
- x: number of cups of drink A used
- y: number of cups of drink B used

Extracted Constraints:
- 8x + 15y \geq 150 (Vitamin A constraint)
- 6x + 2y \geq 300 (Vitamin D constraint)
- 10x + 20y \leq 400 (Vitamin E constraint)
- x \geq 0 (Non-negativity constraint for x)
- y \geq 0 (Non-negativity constraint for y)

Extracted Objective:
- Minimize 4x + 12y (Minimize the amount of Vitamin K)
